mapper.select:

mapper.update: UPDATE dogboard SET b_title = #{b_title}, b_content = #{b_content}, b_price = #{b_price}, b_inventory = #{b_inventory}, b_from = #{b_from}, b_id = #{b_id} WHERE b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.select:
